newsitem.title: USA: Kroger to raise square footage six pct/year.
newsitem.headline: Kroger to raise square footage six pct/year.

text.p: Kroger Co said on Thursday that over the next three years, it expects to expand its store base by about 100 projects per year, resulting in an annual compounded reatil square footage gain of about six percent.
Kroger operates about 1,325 supermarkets and 819 convenience stores.
